title: 24. How Can You Choose the Best Doctor?
description: We often select doctors based on their reputations or on misconceptions about what really matters. But research shows that doctors’ experience and where they trained can significantly impact patient care.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: We often select doctors based on their reputations or on misconceptions about what really matters. But research shows that doctors’ experience and where they trained can significantly impact patient care.
